Source code for heliolib.utils.time_zone_info_handler.test_validate_timezone_string

import pytest
from heliolib.utils.time_zone_info_handler import TimeZoneInfoHandler




[docs]
def test_validate_with_none_timezone():
    timezone_str = None
    """Test validating None as timezone string."""
    with pytest.raises(ValueError) as e_info:
        TimeZoneInfoHandler.validate_timezone_string(timezone_str)
    assert str(e_info.value) == "Timezone string cannot be None."




# Test with an invalid timezone string


[docs]
def test_exception_with_invalid_timezone():
    timezone_str = "Invalid/Timezone"
    """Test validating an invalid timezone string."""
    with pytest.raises(Exception) as e_info:
        TimeZoneInfoHandler.validate_timezone_string(timezone_str)
    assert (
        str(e_info.value)
        == f"An error occurred while validating the timezone string: {timezone_str}"
    )
